snippet: A “Weekend of Resistance” over the death of Michael Brown gets underway with attention to the shooting of another black teenager, Vonderrit Myers Jr.
abstract: Planned four-day stretch of protests against law enforcement practices opens in St Louis against background of renewed suspicions and fresh skirmishes between police and demonstrators; rallies are taking place as St Louis area is again embroiled in turmoil following shooting of black teenager Vonderrit Myers Jr by white off-duty officer.

byline.original: By ALAN BLINDER and MONICA DAVEY

lead_paragraph: A “Weekend of Resistance” over the death of Michael Brown gets underway with attention to the shooting of another black teenager, Vonderrit Myers Jr.

headline.main: Protests Begin Over Ferguson Shooting Amid Dismay in St. Louis Case
headline.print_headline: Protests Begin Over Ferguson Shooting Amid Dismay in St. Louis Case
